verses.plain: Blessed is the man that walketh not in the counsel of the ungodly, nor standeth in the way of sinners, nor sitteth in the seat of the scornful.

tokens.t: the man that walketh not in the counsel of the ungodly, nor standeth in the way of sinners, nor sitteth in the seat of the scornful.

verses.plain: But his delight is in the law of the LORD; and in his law doth he meditate day and night.

tokens.t: ; and in his law doth he meditate day and night.

verses.plain: And he shall be like a tree planted by the rivers of water, that bringeth forth his fruit in his season; his leaf also shall not wither; and whatsoever he doeth shall prosper.

tokens.t: And he shall be like a tree planted by the rivers of water, that bringeth forth his fruit in his season; his leaf also shall not wither; and whatsoever he doeth shall prosper.

verses.plain: The ungodly are not so: but are like the chaff which the wind driveth away.

tokens.t: like the chaff which the wind driveth away.

verses.plain: Therefore the ungodly shall not stand in the judgment, nor sinners in the congregation of the righteous.

tokens.t: Therefore the ungodly shall not stand in the judgment, nor sinners in the congregation of the righteous.

verses.plain: For the LORD knoweth the way of the righteous: but the way of the ungodly shall perish.

tokens.t: knoweth the way of the righteous: but the way of the ungodly shall perish.
